items.title: Strawberry cheesecake in 4 easy steps
items.description: Follow our step-by-step recipe for this easy no-cook cheesecake – a delicious summer dessert for all occasions

items.title: New York cheesecake
items.description: This authentic creamy dessert will add a taste of New York to any dining table. Our American-style baked cheesecake recipe makes an easy family dessert.

items.title: Luscious lemon baked cheesecake
items.description: A simple but very impressive pud, light enough to have a slice to finish a big meal

items.title: Millionaire’s cheesecake
items.description: Indulge in this no-bake chocolate cheesecake after a special dinner. Whether it's for New Year's Eve or a birthday, it's sure to impress

image.alt: Millionaire’s cheesecake served on a cake stand
image.title: Millionaire’s cheesecake

items.title: White chocolate, mascarpone & pistachio cheesecake
items.description: Try this baked cheesecake with a difference. With a slightly sour tang, plus white chocolate and pistachio flavours, it's a heavenly dessert

image.alt: White chocolate, mascarpone & pistachio cheesecake with a slice cut out
image.title: White chocolate, mascarpone & pistachio cheesecake

items.title: Malt chocolate cheesecake
items.description: This crowd-pleasing dessert is made ahead, so all you have to do on the night is take it out of the fridge and bask in the glory

items.title: Salted caramel cheesecake
items.description: Our make-ahead salted caramel cheesecake means you can serve up a showstopper, save time in the kitchen and spend time with your guests

items.title: Chocolate cheesecake
items.description: Treat family and friends to this decadent chocolate dessert. It's an indulgent end to a dinner party or weekend family meal

image.alt: Chocolate cheesecake with two slices cut out
image.title: Chocolate cheesecake

items.title: Triple-layered berry cheesecake
items.description: Make this showstopping cheesecake for summer entertaining. Top with strawberries or a mix of fresh berries, plus a drizzle of chocolate for extra indulgence

image.alt: Triple-layered berry cheesecake served on a plate
image.title: Triple-layered berry cheesecake

items.title: Burnt Basque cheesecake
items.description: Try this Spanish-style baked cheesecake with a burnished exterior. With crème caramel-style bittersweet notes and a creamy yet light centre, it's heavenly

image.alt: Burnt Basque cheesecake in baking parchment
image.title: Burnt Basque cheesecake

items.title: Pumpkin cheesecake
items.description: Celebrate autumn with this seasonal baked cheesecake. With a moreish, lightly spiced, creamy filling and crunchy ginger base, it's well worth the effort

image.alt: Pumpkin cheesecake on a cake stand
image.title: Pumpkin cheesecake

items.title: Layered lime cheesecake
items.description: Make this stunning layered, citrussy dessert ahead of time if you're entertaining. It's a crowd-pleaser that's part key lime pie, part cheesecake, part trifle

image.alt: A cake stand serving a layered lime cheesecake
image.title: Layered lime cheesecake

items.title: No-bake chocolate cheesecake
items.description: What could be more decadent? A crushed chocolate digestive biscuit base is layered with two types of creamy chocolate then topped with Maltesers and chocolate buttons – and no oven needed

image.alt: Maltesers no-bake cheesecake, with milk chocolate, dark chocolate, Maltesers and chocolate buttons on a cake stand
image.title: Maltesers no-bake chocolate cheesecake

items.title: Baileys cheesecake
items.description: An intense layer of coffee jelly perfects this creamy cheesecake. Serve with one of our coffee cocktails for unadulterated indulgence

items.title: Tia Maria cheesecake
items.description: Perfect for a special occasion, this American style dessert really has the wow-factor

items.title: No-bake orange cheesecake
items.description: This is an easy cheesecake for kids to prepare with just a little supervision – they'll love smashing up the biscuits for the base.

items.title: White chocolate & raspberry ripple baked cheesecake
items.description: Swirl sharp raspberry purée through a creamy white chocolate and vanilla cheesecake filling for a perfectly-balanced dessert. It's ideal for a special occasion

image.alt: White chocolate & raspberry ripple baked cheesecake with two individual slices alongside
image.title: White chocolate and raspberry ripple baked cheesecake

items.title: Double chocolate cheesecake
items.description: Cheesecake is always incredibly popular, but add chocolate and it elevates it to something with even more crowd appeal

items.title: Bakewell cheesecake
items.description: This almond and cherry baked cheesecake is a heavenly marriage of two amazing desserts

items.title: Eton mess cheesecake
items.description: If you’re after a summer dessert to impress, try this decadent Eton mess cheesecake filled with creamy mascarpone, topped with meringues and strawberries

image.alt: A plate serving Eton mess cheesecake
image.title: Eton mess cheesecake

items.title: Christmas pudding cheesecake
items.description: Cross a Christmas pudding with a cheesecake and what do you get? A fantastic alternative festive dessert with a crunchy ginger base and creamy filling

items.title: Lemon cheesecake
items.description: Need a simple, zingy dessert you can make with minimal fuss? Try this creamy lemon cheesecake, made with just a few basic storecupboard ingredients

image.alt: Cheesecake on cake stand with knife
image.title: Lemon cheesecake

items.title: Chocolate hazelnut ice cream cheesecake
items.description: No one will guess that this easy, rich and creamy no-cook, make-ahead cheesecake uses only 4 ingredients - ideal for a dinner party

items.title: Espresso martini cheesecake
items.description: Make this grown-up dessert for a celebration dinner, or as an alternative to Christmas pudding. Spiked with coffee liqueur, it’s sophisticated and luxurious

image.alt: Espresso martini cheesecake garnished with coffee beans
image.title: Espresso martini cheesecake

items.title: Cookie dough cheesecake
items.description: Celebrate Easter with our creamy choc cheesecake – it has a rich base studded with cookie dough, and it's all topped with silky ganache. Decorate with mini eggs and cookies

image.alt: Cookie dough cheesecake served on a plate
image.title: Cookie dough cheesecake

items.title: Peach streusel cheesecake
items.description: Bake a creamy cheesecake topped with soft, sweet peaches and crispy streusel – a luscious dessert to round off a summer meal

image.alt: Peach streusel cheesecake served on on dish
image.title: Peach streusel cheesecake

items.title: Chocolate orange cheesecake
items.description: This decadent, make-ahead dessert is perfect for a festive dinner party or buffet, with a zesty cream cheese filling and dark chocolate biscuit base

items.title: Frozen pumpkin cheesecake
items.description: Swap your usual pumpkin pie for our no-bake, make-ahead cheesecake. It’s perfect for Halloween or Bonfire Night, or as an autumn dessert for the dinner table

image.alt: Frozen pumpkin cheesecake with a slice cut out
image.title: Frozen pumpkin cheesecake

items.title: Tea & biscuits cheesecake bars
items.description: What's better than dunking biscuits into tea? These ingenious tea and biscuits cheesecake bars capture that flavour sensation perfectly

image.alt: Tea & biscuits cheesecake bars served on a patterned board
image.title: Tea & biscuits cheesecake bars

items.title: Slow cooker muscovado cheesecake with hazelnuts & blackberries
items.description: This unbelievably creamy cheesecake has a sumptuous berry syrup and the crunch of toasted hazelnuts to top it off - ideal for feeding a crowd

image.alt: Slow cooker muscovado cheesecake with hazelnuts & blackberries 2016
image.title: Slow cooker muscovado cheesecake with hazelnuts & blackberries 2016

items.title: Little buttermilk cheesecakes with honey roast summer fruits
items.description: These pretty miniature baked cheesecakes are so easy to make and serve. Adjust the toppings throughout the year, using whatever fruits are in season

image.alt: Little buttermilk cheesecakes with honey roast summer fruits served on a wire tray
image.title: Little buttermilk cheesecakes with honey roast summer fruits

items.title: Rhubarb & gingernut cheesecake
items.description: What could be more cheerful than this vivid pink no-bake cheesecake? Rhubarb and ginger are merry bedfellows and make a stunning springtime dessert

image.alt: Rhubarb & gingernut cheesecake on a plate
image.title: Rhubarb & gingernut cheesecake

items.title: Frozen banana & peanut butter cheesecake
items.description: A great standby dessert with that works well and will impress children and adults

items.title: White chocolate & ricotta cheesecake
items.description: This mouthwatering cheesecake is the perfect way to finish a large Sunday lunch, as it's incredibly light despite being made with chocolate

items.title: Baked raspberry & lemon cheesecake
items.description: A rich and creamy baked cheesecake that makes a great dinner party dessert

items.title: Maracuja (Passion fruit mousse traybake)
items.description: We've turned this tangy Brazilian mousse pudding into a traybake cheesecake with biscuit base and gelatine to help with slicing

items.title: White chocolate cheesecake
items.description: Make a simple, creamy dessert for a dinner party with very little effort. Pairing this white chocolate cheesecake with fresh fruit offsets the richness

image.alt: Slice of cheesecake with a strawberry on top, by a fork
image.title: White chocolate cheesecake

items.title: Lemon meringue cheesecake
items.description: Serve a slice of this sweet treat and find yourself in double dessert heaven - lemon meringue pie meets creamy citrus cheesecake

items.title: No-bake chocolate hazelnut cheesecake
items.description: Reader Jessica Creed shares her showy, no-fail chocolate dessert - it's perfect for entertaining

items.title: Yogurt cheesecake with honey-roasted apricots
items.description: Transform your desserts with a drizzle of golden nectar. Top this honeyed cheesecake with honey-roasted apricots or swap with any soft fruit or rhubarb

image.alt: Yogurt cheesecake with honey-roasted apricots served on a cake stand
image.title: Yogurt cheesecake with honey-roasted apricots

items.title: Spiced maple & pecan cheesecake bars
items.description: This rich cheesecake is spiced with warming flavours of ginger, cinnamon and nutmeg - top with maple syrup and nuts

items.title: Peach Melba cheesecake
items.description: A no-cook, make-ahead party favourite with a thick, cream cheese topping, a buttery biscuit base and finished with raspberry coulis

items.title: Vegan lemon cheesecake
items.description: An easy no-cook cheesecake that's dairy-free and gluten-free with just a little agave syrup to sweeten. A lusciously lemony vegan dessert that the family will love

items.title: Orange & pomegranate cheesecake
items.description: A perfect dinner party dessert with pretty fruit decorative topping and cream cheese on a buttery biscuit base

items.title: Peanut butter cheesecake
items.description: This irresistible cheesecake is the perfect indulgence for peanut butter fans - freeze for up to two months and serve as a show-stopping dinner party dessert

items.title: White chocolate berry cheesecake
items.description: A stunning no-cook pudding bursting with summer flavours - great for relaxed entertaining

items.title: Caramel ripple cheesecake cups
items.description: Individual pudding pots with almond flavours from crunchy amaretti biscuits combined with smooth cream and caramel

items.title: Blueberry swirl cheesecake
items.description: The creamy, sweet texture of this baked vanilla pudding is complemented by a vibrant fruit sauce

items.title: Little strawberry cheesecakes
items.description: Individual portions will save fights over the biggest slice of this creamy ricotta pud with fruity compote

items.title: Manuka honey cheesecake with raspberries
items.description: This fruity summer cheesecake can be part-prepared a day ahead

items.title: Caramel cheesecake
items.description: Molasses flavour from muscovado sugars and a topping of thinly sliced fudge... this make-ahead pud is pure indulgence

items.title: The ultimate makeover: New York cheesecake
items.description: Angela Nilsen rises to the ultimate challenge - keeping a cheesecake creamy and decadent while making it healthier and lighter

image.alt: The ultimate makeover: New York cheesecake
image.title: The ultimate makeover: New York cheesecake

items.title: Kahlúa chocolate cheesecake
items.description: Decadent, tempting chocolate cheesecake with the taste of coffee liqueur

items.title: Baked vegan cheesecake with raspberries & clementine
items.description: Enjoy a baked cheesecake made with cashews for a vegan take on a classic dessert. With clementines, raspberries and pistachios, it's perfect for Christmas

image.alt: Baked vegan cheesecake with raspberries & clementine served on a cake stand
image.title: Baked vegan cheesecake with raspberries & clementine

items.title: Pink strawberry cheesecake
items.description: An impressive centrepiece for a dinner party dessert

items.title: Berry cheesecake in a glass
items.description: Mascarpone is a great standby for making an almost-instant dessert. Here, its creamy richness is cut by the sharpness of the blackberries

items.title: White chocolate cheesecake with rhubarb compote
items.description: This soft and creamy cheesecake makes a suitably impressive and indulgent end to a dinner party

image.alt: White chocolate cheesecake with rhubarb compote
image.title: White chocolate cheesecake with rhubarb compote

items.title: Cherry swirl cheesecake
items.description: Swirls of cherries ensure this sublime cheesecake has a summer flavour, perfect for a sunset dinner party outside

items.title: Lemon quark cheesecake
items.description: This light and luscious lemon cheesecake tastes as good as it looks

items.title: Hot cross bun cheesecakes
items.description: A creamy dessert that tastes exactly like your favourite Easter bake - the hot cross bun. Top with orange zest, juice and a drizzle of icing for the characteristic cross

items.title: Lingonberry & ginger cheesecake pots
items.description: Layer up ginger snaps, a zesty cream cheese and lingonberry jam in glasses for these stunning individual desserts to finish off a Swedish supper for two

items.title: Tropical cheesecake bars
items.description: Fresh mango, a crunchy biscuit base and smooth cream cheese filling make a light summer dessert everyone will love. Top with passion fruit, pineapple and creamy lemon curd

items.title: Cheesecake biscuit beach
items.description: If you're feeling creative, this biscuit beach scene with vanilla cheesecake filling will not only look brilliant but will taste great too

items.title: No-bake vanilla cheesecake
items.description: Enjoy a slice of pure indulgence in the form of our easy no-bake vanilla cheesecake. This easy dessert is delicious served with a fresh strawberry compote

image.alt: Cheesecake with slice on plate with strawberry compote
image.title: Vanilla cheesecake

items.title: Lime semifreddo cheesecake
items.description: This attractive frozen dessert can be made ahead and frozen for up to 3 months - perfect to get ahead for a Christmas dinner party

items.title: Easter egg cheesecake
items.description: Got leftover Easter eggs to use up? Try incorporating them into an easy no-bake vanilla cheesecake. Chill the cheesecake overnight for the best results

image.alt: Easter egg cheesecake with the first slice cut out
image.title: Easter egg cheesecake

items.title: Rainbow cheesecake
items.description: Our showstopping, colourfully layered cheesecake is sure to brighten up any party, especially if you’re celebrating Pride month. It’s easy to make as well.
